QuestData.Title: WANTED: Mara'nar the Thunderous
QuestData.Description:
Looking for a mighty hunter to take down a rampaging beast!
A thunder lizard named Mara'nar the Thunderous worked his way from Thunderspine Thicket to Primordial Vale, disrupting local wildlife. It has electrified water, knocked down trees, and broken duck nests.
This menace must be stopped. Slay him and bring one of his plates to Khansguard Jebotai as proof.
May Ohn'ahra guide you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Disrupting the local wildlife of Primordial Vale, this beast has smashed one too many duck nests.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Mara'nar the Thunderous in Primordial Vale and retrieve one of his plates.
QuestData.RewardText: Mara'nar has been slain. May his kin learn to stay within their own lands.
